title: Standards Index Schema
description: Defines the structure for the standards_index.json file, which contains an index of key metadata from standard documents.

standards.description: An array of standard document metadata objects.

standard_id.description: Unique identifier for the standard document.

title.description: The official title of the standard document.

primary_domain.description: The primary domain code this standard belongs to (e.g., AS, CS).

sub_domain.description: The sub-domain code within the primary domain (e.g., STRUCTURE, POLICY).

info-type.description: The info-type of the document, indicating its structural role or content type.

version.description: The semantic version of the standard (e.g., "0.1.0", "1.2.3").

status.description: The current lifecycle status of the standard (e.g., "draft", "approved").

filepath.description: Relative path to the standard document from the repository root, using POSIX separators.

date-modified.description: The date and time the document was last significantly modified, in ISO-8601 format.
